thread.title: Small Rooms, but Very friendly staff and close to much
thread.title_full: Small Rooms, but Very friendly staff and close to much - Review of Ibis Paris Bastille Faubourg Saint Antoine 11eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: shannonsnyder
title: Small Rooms, but Very friendly staff and close to much
text: It started off with a very friendly man at the front desk. Very helpful. The room was a bit small, but we were only sleeping there anyway. It was clean and very close to a lot of restaurants and stores, and a short stroll to the Paris Opera Ballet performance that we had that night.
